basic.description: This course is an introduction to the history and development of environmental regulation and its scientific basis. Application of fundamental chemical engineering techniques involving mass transfer theory and reaction kinetics to problems associated with the fate of contaminants in the environment.
basic.subject: ECH
basic.title: Chemical Engineering - Environmental

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ECH 3274L, ECH 3418, and ECH 4267. Corequisites: ECH 4404L, ECH 4504, and ECH 4604.
